Text: Hey fellow piraters! Found out that the album Drowning In Negativity is destroyed and there were absolutely no working .zip, .rar, torrents or other files of it. i youtube to mp3'd it and ill put up a new torrent of this when my laptop is fixed in a few days. i would suggest that even if you have downloaded this torrent to also download the other for it is complete and Drowning in negativity is my favorite album.
